     <h1>

      </span>
     </h1>

     <span id="lastupdate" class="lastupdate">

      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17308046">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17308046">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17308046">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17308046">
          <table style="width: 90%;" align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
           <tbody>
            <tr>
             <td width="47%">
              <p>
              </p>
             </td>
             <td width="47%">
              <p>
              </p>
             </td>
             <td width="47%">
              <p>
              </p>
             </td>
            </tr>
           </tbody>
          </table>
          <p>
           <strong>
            Rachel Hamelers
           </strong>
           <br />
           <em>
            Sciences
            <br />
           </em>
           Phone: 484-664-3601
           <br />
           <a href="mailto:rhamelers@muhlenberg.edu">
            rhamelers@muhlenberg.edu
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
           <strong>
            Jen Jarson
           </strong>
           <br />
           <em>
            Social Sciences
            <br />
           </em>
           Phone: 484-664-3552
           <br />
           <a href="mailto:jarson@muhlenberg.edu">
            jarson@muhlenberg.edu
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17308046" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21159737">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21159737">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21159737">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting the Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16932507">
          <p>
           When searching for articles, you may find the
           <strong>
            full-text
           </strong>
           of an article
           <strong>
            linked
           </strong>
           in the database. If not:
          </p>
          <ul>
           <li>
            Most databases have a
            <strong>
             Check for Full Text
            </strong>
            &nbsp;buttons. Click the link to check our holdings.
            <br />
            <br />
           </li>
           <li>
            If there is not a&nbsp;
            <strong>
             Check for Full Text
            </strong>
            &nbsp;buttons,
            <strong>
             search
             <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch">
              Encompass
             </a>
            </strong>
            to see if we have access to the full text in print or through another database.
           </li>
          </ul>
          <p>
           If we do not have access to the article you need,
           <strong>
            request
           </strong>
           the article via
           <strong>
            Interlibrary Loan
           </strong>
           :
          </p>
          <ul>
           <li>
            Many databases have a
            <strong>
             <em>
              Request on Interlibrary Loan
             </em>
            </strong>
            or
            <strong>
             <em>
              Request Item
             </em>
            </strong>
            link or button. Click here to fill out a request form.
           </li>
          </ul>
          <ul>
           <li>
            If the database does not have an ILL link embedded, go to the Library Homepage -- Services --
            <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html?form=article">
             Interlibrary Loan
            </a>
            . Fill out the form. NOTE: Interlibrary Loan can take anywhere from a few day to a few weeks. Plan accordingly.
           </li>
          </ul>
          <div id="boxatt16932507" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17308064">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17308064">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17308064">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Selected Reference Materials
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17308064">
          <div id="boxatt17308064" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20381320">
              <a id="link_20381320" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20381320,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental &amp; Cultural Conservation in Latin America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12327125}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Hundreds of dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from respected publishers across dozens of major subject areas, including many notable titles for psychology. Full text is linked directly in the database.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20381327">
              Encyclopedia of Biodiversity
              <div class="linkdesc">
               333.9503 E56o v.1-5 (Level B)
               <br />
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20381329">
              Encyclopedia of Contemporary Latin American and Caribbean Cultures
              <div class="linkdesc">
               972.9003 E56o v.1-3 (Level C)
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20381331">
              <a id="link_20381331" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/1UMT" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20381331,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental &amp; Cultural Conservation in Latin America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12402162}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Latin American History and Culture
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Signed articles written by leading scholars in the field. Great for topic narrowing and for identifying the most important articles and books on a subject.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20381346">
              Indigenous Peoples and Environmental Issues: An Encyclopedia
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Reference 304.2 J65i (Level B)
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20381348">
              Latin America and the Caribbean: A Continental Overview of Environmental Issues
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Reference 363.70098 H655L (Level B)
               <br />
               <br />
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17308172">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17308172">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17308172">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding Books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17308172">
          <div id="boxatt17308172" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20381358">
              <a id="link_20381358" href="http://books.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20381358,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental &amp; Cultural Conservation in Latin America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508825}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Search within the text of books and then click on "Find in a Library" to submit an interlibrary loan request for the complete text.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17308190">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17308190">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17308190">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding Articles: Databases &amp; Indexes
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17308190">
          <p>
           <strong>
            For subject specific databases check out the
            <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu">
             Subject Guides
            </a>
            .
           </strong>
          </p>
          <p>
           <strong>
            See a list of all databases via
            <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/databases-az.html">
             Databases A to Z
            </a>
            .
           </strong>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17308190" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link23864899">
              <a id="link_23864899" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23864899,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental &amp; Cultural Conservation in Latin America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12335038}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of both scholarly and popular publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas. Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the Get It links to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20417765">
              <a id="link_20417765" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=8gh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20417765,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental &amp; Cultural Conservation in Latin America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12833605}); ">
               GreenFile
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               GreenFile's resources focus on the ways humans affect the environment, providing indexing and some full text of scholarly and general interest items. Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the Get It links to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20381760">
              <a id="link_20381760" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20381760,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental &amp; Cultural Conservation in Latin America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12364481}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of scholarly journals for most academic disciplines. The most recent three to five years of most journals are generally not included. Full text is linked directly in the database.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20381776">
              <a id="link_20381776" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20381776,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental &amp; Cultural Conservation in Latin America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12369574}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of popular newspapers, magazines, and broadcast transcripts, as well as business publications, legal materials, and more. Full text is linked directly in the database.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17308341">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17308341">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17308341">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Selected Data and Statistical Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17308341">
          <div id="boxatt17308341" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20381860">
              <a id="link_20381860" href="http://www.bccr.fi.cr/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20381860,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental &amp; Cultural Conservation in Latin America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20381860}); ">
               Banco Central de Costa Rica (Central Bank of Costa Rica)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Spanish only.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25219381">
              <a id="link_25219381" href="http://www.cdc.gov/datastatistics/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25219381,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental &amp; Cultural Conservation in Latin America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25219381}); ">
               Centers for Disease and Control and Prevention: Data and Statistics
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20381871">
              <a id="link_20381871" href="http://www.inec.go.cr/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20381871,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental &amp; Cultural Conservation in Latin America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20381871}); ">
               INEC: Instituto Nacional de Estadistica y Censos de Costa Rica (Official statistical agency of Costa Rica)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Spanish only.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20778056">
              <a id="link_20778056" href="http://www.mag.go.cr/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20778056,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental &amp; Cultural Conservation in Latin America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20778056}); ">
               Ministerio de Agricultura y Ganaderia Costa Rica (Ministry of Agriculture)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20418136">
              <a id="link_20418136" href="http://www.minae.go.cr/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20418136,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental &amp; Cultural Conservation in Latin America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20418136}); ">
               Ministerio del Ambiente y Energía (Ministry of Environment and Energy)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20418008">
              <a id="link_20418008" href="http://www.inbio.ac.cr/en/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20418008,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental &amp; Cultural Conservation in Latin America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20417837}); ">
               National Biodiversity Institute (INBio) of Costa Rica
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               "A private research and biodiversity management center, established in 1989 to support all efforts made to gather knowledge on the country’s biological diversity and promote its sustainable use. [...] INBio is a non-governmental, non-profit, public interest organization of civil society that works in close collaboration with different government institutions, universities, the private sector and other public and private organizations, both within and outside Costa Rica."
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20382140">
              <a id="link_20382140" href="http://www.offstats.auckland.ac.nz/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20382140,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental &amp; Cultural Conservation in Latin America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12808360}); ">
               OFFSTATS
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Links to free official, international statistics resources by country, region, and subject.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23872642">
              <a id="link_23872642" href="http://www.paho.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23872642,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental &amp; Cultural Conservation in Latin America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23872642}); ">

              </a>

             </li>
             <li id="link20381879">

             </li>
             <li id="link20381925">
              <a id="link_20381925" href="http://hdr.undp.org" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20381925,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental &amp; Cultural Conservation in Latin America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20381925}); ">
               United Nations Development Programme. Human Development Report
              </a>

               <br />
               Print: 338.9 H918d 2009 (Level B)
               <br />
              </div>

             <li id="link20381890">
              <a id="link_20381890" href="http://www.eclac.org/cgi-bin/getProd.asp?xml=/deype/agrupadores_xml/aes250.xml&amp;xsl=/agrupadores_xml/a16l.xsl" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20381890,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental &amp; Cultural Conservation in Latin America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20381890}); ">

               Print: 318.5 A636e 2008 (Level B)
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20381953">

       <div id="wrapbox17308669">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17308669">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17308669">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Selected Websites
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17308669">
          <div id="boxatt17308669" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25219382">
              <a id="link_25219382" href="http://www.cdc.gov/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25219382,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental &amp; Cultural Conservation in Latin America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25219382}); ">
               Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20382155">
              <a id="link_20382155" href="http://www.yorku.ca/cerlac/index.htm" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20382155,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental &amp; Cultural Conservation in Latin America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20382155}); ">
               Centre for Research on Latin America &amp; the Caribbean
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Independent research unit that is concerned with the economic development, political and social organization and cultural controversies in Latin America and the Caribbean.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25219351">
              <a id="link_25219351" href="https://www.cia.gov/library/publications/the-world-factbook/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25219351,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental &amp; Cultural Conservation in Latin America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12808438}); ">
               CIA World Factbook
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Information, including statistics, on the history, people, government, economy, geography, communications, transportation, military, and transnational issues for hundreds of world entities.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20778637">
              <a id="link_20778637" href="http://insidecostarica.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20778637,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental &amp; Cultural Conservation in Latin America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20778637}); ">
               Costa Rican English News Source
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20382167">
              <a id="link_20382167" href="http://www.gksoft.com/govt/en/cr.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20382167,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental &amp; Cultural Conservation in Latin America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20382167}); ">
               Governments on the WWW: Costa Rica
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A collection of links to national institutions within Costa Rica's government, as well political party websites and more.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20382175">
              <a id="link_20382175" href="http://lanic.utexas.edu/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20382175,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental &amp; Cultural Conservation in Latin America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20382175}); ">
               LANIC
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A website on Latin American countries from the University of Texas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20417837">
              <a id="link_20417837" href="http://www.inbio.ac.cr/en/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20417837,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental &amp; Cultural Conservation in Latin America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20417837}); ">
               National Biodiversity Institute (INBio) of Costa Rica
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               "A private research and biodiversity management center, established in 1989 to support all efforts made to gather knowledge on the country’s biological diversity and promote its sustainable use. [...] INBio is a non-governmental, non-profit, public interest organization of civil society that works in close collaboration with different government institutions, universities, the private sector and other public and private organizations, both within and outside Costa Rica."
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20778596">
              <a id="link_20778596" href="http://www.nationsonline.org/oneworld/costa_rica.htm#Government" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20778596,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental &amp; Cultural Conservation in Latin America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20778596}); ">
               Nations Online: Costa Rica
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Portal to information on Costa Rica
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20382186">
              <a id="link_20382186" href="http://www.state.gov/r/pa/ei/bgn" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20382186,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental &amp; Cultural Conservation in Latin America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20382186}); ">
               U.S. Bilateral Relations Fact Sheets
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Great for current information on specific countries.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>

     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4698528" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17308729">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17308729">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17308729">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing Your Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17308729">
          <p>
           No matter where your information comes from, you always need to cite your sources.
          </p>
          <p>
           To find information about how and why to cite, including examples of the most frequently used citation styles (APA, Chicago, and MLA), go to the
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            Cite Sources
           </a>
           section on the Library homepage. Copies of style manuals are available at the Reference Desk in Trexler Library.
          </p>
          <p>
           For additional information on citation styles, see the Writer's Handbook from the University of Wisconsin--Madison:
           <a href="http://writing.wisc.edu/Handbook/Documentation.html">
            http://writing.wisc.edu/Handbook/Documentation.html
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           Are you interested in gathering and organizing sources as you research? Try Zotero - a research tool for managing your references. For more information on installing and using Zotero, go to
           <a href="https://www.zotero.org/">
            https://www.zotero.org/
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17308729" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
